original_text: Then the king of the North will invade the realm of the king of the South but will retreat to his own country.
korean_text: 북방 왕이 남방 왕의 왕국으로 쳐들어갈 것이나 자기 본국으로 물러가리라

sentences.original_text: Then the king of the North will invade the realm of the king of the South
sentences.korean_translation: 그때 북방 왕이 남방 왕의 영토를 침공할 것이나

sentences.original_text: but will retreat to his own country
